Text:
This is a decent release by BMB. Source is a VHS screener so the picture quality is a little blurry and pixelated, not to mention it is in fullscreen. The watermark on the lower left has been blurred out and is noticable at times. Audio is decent, but not that great.

For screenshots and nfo: http://www.hypoh.com/movies/screener-vhs/schoolforscoundrelsscreenerxvid-bmb
